## âœ… Quality Checklist

- [ ] **Code:** Follows project standards (lint, formatting)?
- [ ] **Functionality:** Fully meets the requirements of the related issue?
- [ ] **Tests:**
  - [ ] Tests were created/updated to cover the changes?
  - [ ] All existing tests pass?
  - [ ] Test coverage was maintained or improved? (for projects with metrics)
- [ ] **Security:** Does not expose sensitive data, tokens, or credentials?
- [ ] **Build/CI:** CI pipeline passes without errors?
- [ ] **Conflicts:** Was **pull/merge from target branch** done before the PR?
- [ ] **Commits:** Messages follow conventional pattern? (e.g., `feat/10 : description`)
- [ ] **Documentation:** Was it updated (README, comments, CHANGELOG) if necessary?
- [ ] **Dependencies:** Were they correctly updated in manifest files?
